abstract.p: Mystic Seaport in Mystic, Conn, plans annual reading of Moby Dick aboard whaling ship Charles W Morgan as birthday tribute to author Herman Melville (S)

block.p: To wish a happy birthday to Herman Melville, Mystic Seaport in Mystic, Conn., annually stages a reading of all 135 chapters of ''Moby-Dick.'' The readings, aboard the whaling ship Charles W. Morgan, begin at noon July 31 and conclude 24 hours later. Singing and costumed actors augment the readings. Visitors can follow along with copies of the book. When the gates close at 5 p.m. on July 31, staff members and volunteers will continue reading through the night, and the public can rejoin the marathon at 9 a.m. At noon Aug. 1, Melville's birthday, a great white cake will be brought out.
